name: Baraf Pani
description:
Baraf Pani is based on a very popular childhood game with the same name which used to be played a lot in every street and corner before the rise of accessible smart phones.

In Baraf Pani there are two teams, the catchers and the runners. The catchers goal is to freeze(Baraf) every member of the runner team under the given time limit and the runners goal is to survive not getting frozen before the time limit is reached.

If any player from the runner team does get frozen, the other runners can help unfreeze(Pani) there frozen team member by tagging them.

Note: This game is multiplayer only!

For Multiplayer: minimum 3 players required and max 5 players allowed in a room. One player who created the room will be the host(master client) and they will have the access to start the game.
